data.title: Kim Nelson on LinkedIn: #thankyou #grateful #grateful #microsoft
data.meta_description: There are so many things to love about working at Microsoft, one I am particularly grateful for is the constant and enthusiast support of my team, peersâ€¦ | 67 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

There are so many things to love about working at Microsoft, one I am particularly grateful for is the constant and enthusiast support of my team, peers, partners and leaders. When an amazing opportunity outside of Microsoft presented itself, they were my biggest cheerleaders. Thank you to my amazing Microsoft CE&S network (there are too many of you to name here) and our Delivery Partners for your partnership and trust - and lots of laughs along the way - as we worked to drive value within the business and improve our customers' support experiences. My time at Microsoft, and the opportunity to work with each of you, has been one of the greatest privileges of my career. This is not goodbye, but see you later.... #thankyou #grateful #grateful #microsoft
